statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 1 AND schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE employee_id = 123 AND schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE shift_start_time < '08:00:00' AND shift_end_time > '17:00:00';
DELETE FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE meal_break_start_time < '12:00:00' AND meal_break_end_time > '13:00:00';
DELETE FROM Employees WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM WorkSchedule WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND start_time = '08:00:00';
DELETE FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager' AND employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM WorkSchedule WHERE date = '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM payroll WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager');
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT id FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate < 15);
DELETE FROM payroll WHERE payroll_id IN (SELECT payroll_id FROM payroll p JOIN employees e ON p.employee_id = e.id WHERE e.position = 'Intern');
